ygData.subject: About the polls
ygData.msgSnippet: So far 6 people have participated in the poll about the source of scenarios in a tournament and 6 people have participated in the poll about how many scenarios

From: "Daniel Paul Hightower" <dph_of_rules@...>

So far 6 people have participated in the poll about the source of 
scenarios in a tournament and 6 people have participated in the poll 
about how many scenarios in the tournament.  I am willing to bet its 
the same people for both polls.

If I work under the assumption that there might a lot more people 
willing to participate in the tournament if the rules were published, 
I could proceed.

Now, I arrive at a question: how do we proceed in making rules for the 
tournament?  Do we want a separate yahoo group to hash out the rules  
in secret and then publish the rules once we finish or do we want to 
discuss possible rules in this group?
